Patients assign receive Peginterferon alfa ( Pegasys ) 180 mcg sc week Ribavirin ( Copegus ) 800 - 1200 mg po daily either 24 48 week . Allocation treatment arm discretion investigator ( mainly accord genotype ) . Adverse event monitor throughout study hematologic parameter every 2 week twice 24-week follow-up .
